description:
Persistent memory system that remembers user preferences, common topics, recurring questions, and learning patterns across all agent interactions. Enables agents to provide increasingly personalized responses without requiring context repetition.

**Rationale:** Users expect AI systems to remember their context and preferences over time. Cross-session memory creates a more natural, efficient interaction pattern and reduces repetitive setup.
title: Cross-session Context Memory
